attributes.action: to stop mp's switch political parties and not holding a by election
attributes.additional_details: with what has happened of late regarding mp's not getting the result they wanted and have changed to a different party. they were elected by their constituents on a certain manifesto promise, but when they move to another party, the same constituents may have voted for someone else,as when an mp moves to another party,that party will have had a different manifesto. this results in my opinion a mis representation of constituents
attributes.background: i wish to have this petition started in order to stop mp's of all political parties from changing to another political party without holding a by election. the party they move from will not have the same manifesto as the one they move to.
